name: Sam & Max Season One: Save the World
name_original: Sam & Max Season One: Save the World
description:
Team up with Sam & Max, self-styled Freelance Police with their own
brand of justice. Uncover clues, interrogate suspects, crack six bizarre
cases, and find out why Sam & Max has been praised as the funniest game
in years.

Season One of this award-winning series can now be played on the Wii. So
get ready to flop down on the couch with your Wii remote in hand and
laugh. A lot.
